original_text: And the hangings of the court, and the curtain for the door of the court, which is by the tabernacle, and by the altar round about, and the cords of it for all the service thereof.
korean_text: 뜰의 휘장과 및 성막과 제단 사방에 있는 뜰의 휘장 문과 그 모든 것에 쓰는 줄들이니라

sentences.original_text: And the hangings of the court
and the curtain for the door of the court
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성 뜰 문을 위한 휘장

sentences.original_text: and by the altar round about
